original: Koch, Jöns Simzon, civilingenjör, Borås, f. 7/9/05 i Buffalo, NY, USA, av civiling. Sven K. o. Blenda Säfström. G. 35 m. Berta Svensson. Barn: Göran f. 36, Christina 38, Elisabeth 44. — Realex. i Tidaholm 20, stud:ex. i Skara 24, utex. fr. CTH (M) 29. Anst. v. STAB 30-35, fabr:-chef v. A-B Rory i Borås 35-39, dito v. A-B Erikson & Larson där sed. 39, styr :led. i sistn. bol. sed. 47. Spec :lär. i konifektioinsteknol. v. Textilinst. i Borås 40-47, v. CTH sed. 47. Medl. av Frlmurarotrdien o. Odd Felliow^. Sikr.: Kon|fektions t ekndk (NKI 43), Arb: studier inom koinfektionsind. (Hermods 44).
translated: Koch, Jöns Simzon, civil engineer, Borås, born 7/9/05 in Buffalo, NY, USA, son of civil engineer Sven K. and Blenda Säfström. Married in 1935 to Berta Svensson. Children: Göran, born 1936, Christina, born 1938, Elisabeth, born 1944. Completed Realexamen in Tidaholm in 1920, studied at Skara, graduating in 1924, and obtained a degree from the Chalmers University of Technology in 1929. Employed at STAB from 1930-1935, factory manager at A-B Rory in Borås from 1935-1939, and at A-B Erikson & Larson from then until 1947, serving as board member since 1947. Specialized teacher in clothing technology at the Textile Institute in Borås from 1940-1947 and at Chalmers University of Technology since 1947. Member of the Freemasons and Odd Fellows. Certified in clothing technology (NKI 1943), conducted work studies within the clothing industry (Hermods 1944).
